review: Love this device I own 3 of them and my house was struck by lighting and needed to repurchase one and that is what I did. I use them to sent music and video from my phone to the TV all the time. From YouTube and from iTunes I can sent video for the whole family to see.Very small package and I use a good quality HDMI cable to hook to the TV.It make any TV smart.Has YouTube,HBO,HULU,Netflix  and many other apps installed and auto updates new apps as they get added.

review: I bought two. One for my boyfriend and one for my mother. My boyfriend had no problem setting it up, but when I tried setting my mother's Apple TV up, it appeared a setting and computer icon only. I reset it and it stayed "activating" for at least 20 minutes. What I did was connect the Apple TV to my iPhone's hotspot, activate the Apple TV and it worked fine. I am super happy with my purchase.
